DOC.brief_summary: This study observe efficacy safety T-Gel 1 % treatment delay puberty adolescent . Subjects complete trial may enter 3 month extension study ( UMD-01-090E ) .
DOC.brief_title: Observation Study T-Gel ( 1 % ) Treatment Adolescent Boys With Hypogonadism
DOC.criteria: Primary secondary hypogonadism constitutional delay growth puberty ( CDGP ) Skin intolerance alcohol allergy soy Generalized skin disease Contraindication testosterone androgen product
